description: Natsuki Komi is Urara`s best friend, she is very energetic and often advises Urara on how to deal with her love for Touma. However her advice often just means "get him in the sack". She usually gets her advice from Cosmo magazine and her mother who states that men are "nothing more than people that buy you stuff". But she does look out for Urara`s well being.
name: Natsuki Komi
